body:
# Keylister Keylister is a jQuery Widget that allows the user to select any key they like for a specific song. The widget automatically injects a list of root notes to select from, and binds each of those buttons to a transpose event. ### Example ```html 
    G                    F
    Some folks are born made to wave the flag,
    C7                          G
    ooh, they're red, white and blue.
    G                        F
    And when the band plays "Hail to the chief"
    C7                             G
    they point the cannon right at you.
    
    ...
```
tagline: jQuery Widget for song key selection
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Keylister
